subpagewatchlist-desc: Adds option to include subpages of watched pages in Special:Watchlist.
tog-watchlisthidesubpages: Hide subpages of watched pages from the watchlist
subpagewatchlist-rcfilter-showsubpages-d: Edits to subpages of watched pages
subpagewatchlist-enotif-body:
Dear $WATCHINGUSERNAME,

$PAGEINTRO $NEWPAGE

You are receiving this email because you are watching its base-page, $PAGETITLEWATCHED.

Editor's summary: $PAGESUMMARY $PAGEMINOREDIT

Contact the editor:
mail: $PAGEEDITOR_EMAIL
wiki: $PAGEEDITOR_WIKI

There will be no other notifications in case of further activity unless you visit this page while logged in. You could also reset the notification flags for all your watched pages on your watchlist.

Your friendly {{SITENAME}} notification system

--
To change your email notification settings, visit
{{canonicalurl:{{#special:Preferences}}}}

To change your watchlist settings, visit
{{canonicalurl:{{#special:EditWatchlist}}}}

To delete the page from your watchlist, visit
$UNWATCHURL

Feedback and further assistance:
$HELPPAGE
tog-enotifwatchlistsubpages: Email me when a sub-page of a page on my watchlist is changed
